content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 29 Sep 2018Just wondering, if EVERY BEGINNER starts buying it (let's assume Nikko AM STI ETF) does that make the fund size grow bigger or does that simply make the price of the ETF inflated?Been hearing a lot of people recommending STI ETF as a good beginner investment product.2 answersAnswerBump1

Luke Ho, Money Maverick at Money MaverickLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 29 Sep 2018It's definitely overrated.​https://www.moneymaverickofficial.com/posts/sti-etf-not-good-beginners​https://financialhorse.com/sti-etf/​Beginners would be better off with a low volatility dividend paying fund. ​​0 comments2
Nicholas ChanLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 29 Sep 2018Both. Fund size gets bigger together with more demand of the underlying stocks increases the price. 0 comments0
